Desc.entry: Provides information on bus, tram and local train routes and timetables. Issues First Mainline tickets, Zone/Travelmaster tickets and tram tickets. Also issues Megatravel passes for 11-16 year olds (proof of age, address and a passport size photo is required), Student 16-18 passes can be ordered on completion of the relevant form (a passport size photo is required), English National passes for OAPs can also be ordered (proof of age and address are required). You may wish to supply a photo but there are webcams available to take photos when ordering these passes. For Mobility Passes apply in the first instance to the Neighbourhoods and Community Care Directorate, Sheffield City Council.
